HOME_DELIVERY.pricing: 4,65 EUR for orders below 50 EUR. Free for orders over 50 EUR.
HOME_DELIVERY.delivery_time: 1 to 7 business days. Orders received on business days by 13:00 will be shipped the same day, while all other orders will be shipped the next business day.

weekend_delivery.days: Delivery is made on business days.

SUMMARY:
DELIVERY OPTIONS: The only available delivery method is home delivery to addresses within the Republic of Croatia. 
PROVIDERS: Delivery is handled by Pošta Slovenije in cooperation with Hrvatska pošta. 
PRICING: Shipping costs 4,65 EUR for orders under 50 EUR and is free for orders of 50 EUR or more. 
DELIVERY TIME: The estimated delivery time is 1 to 7 business days. 
RESTRICTIONS: Deliveries are made only on business days. There is no information regarding surcharges for island deliveries. 
NOTABLE FEATURES: Orders placed by 13:00 on a business day are dispatched the same day. If delivery is unsuccessful, the package can be collected at the nearest post office. 
WEBSITE ASSESSMENT: The shipping information is provided on a dedicated 'Dostava' page and is straightforward. However, it lacks details on alternative delivery methods (parcel shops, lockers, in-store pickup), COD payments, and specific policies for island deliveries.
